results.content: Ardit Sulce is very knowledgeable on the subject of Python and does a good job with the activities and lectures. There is enough content to go around to learning the subject, but I feel the structure of the lectures, from beginning to end could have been thought out and put together differently to make learning easier. Otherwise, no further complaints, good Lecturer.
results.content_html: Ardit Sulce is very knowledgeable on the subject of Python and does a good job with the activities and lectures. There is enough content to go around to learning the subject, but I feel the structure of the lectures, from beginning to end could have been thought out and put together differently to make learning easier. Otherwise, no further complaints, good Lecturer.

results.content: This is very good course for all those who are new to python programming language. Nicely structured contents covering basics of Linux as well. Thanks for the wonderful course.

results.content: I took this course for my quick recap and getting me back on truck. Like I expected, his course is great for the "Python" beginner and other "salvaged" student, specially, like me, who need to refresh my memory, encourage myself. Plus, I could start building my confident again. I can't start other his courses, and also other instructors, too. So exciting!!

results.content: For a beginner that is interested in how to use Python in real world applications, this course is a must. The Desktop App and the Web app projects allow to familiarize with the true use of programming. Anyway, since most fundamental coding topics are introduced very rapidly, it might not be a course for Absolute Beginners (you should have at least some general knowledge on the main structures of coding such as loops, conditionals, etc.).

results.content: all the sections were good except the lectures involving wxpython. I could not import wxpython at all and got many errors. I spent way to long trying to get it to work and it never did. Everything else was really well done!

results.content: It's very basic so good for people who's got little background in computer programming.
results.content_html: It's very basic so good for people who's got little background in computer programming.

results.content: Pretty good course.  I'm not quite sure I would recommend this to anyone who has never learned how to code in any other language.  This is a great course for someone who has learned another language and wants to skip over a lot of the low level skills.  This is good for people who want to jump straight in.  I've taken parts of another python course on UDEMY that goes significantly deeper into details on a lot of things like dictionaries, list, and tuples.

results.content: It has been good so far

I am a complete beginner, didn't even know the basics of python but with the help of this course i forgot that i am a beginner and have started to feel like a pro
will  definitely recommend this course to my friends.
